original_solution_mapping.L1: Of the males with stripes, 40% are babies because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are 10 males with stripes because 4 / .4 = <<4/.4=10>>10
original_solution_mapping.L4: Males make up 40% of the pond's total, because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6482.
    Returns: the total number of turtles in the lake.
    """
    # L1
    adult_percentage_striped_males = 60 # 60% are adults
    total_percentage = 100 # WK
    baby_percentage_striped_males_num = total_percentage - adult_percentage_striped_males
    baby_percentage_striped_males = baby_percentage_striped_males_num / total_percentage

    # L2
    num_baby_striped_males = 4 # 4 are babies
    total_striped_males = num_baby_striped_males / baby_percentage_striped_males

    # L3
    males_with_stripes_fraction = Fraction(1, 4) # 1 in 4 has stripes
    total_males = total_striped_males / males_with_stripes_fraction

    # L4
    female_percentage = 60 # 60% female
    male_percentage_num = total_percentage - female_percentage
    male_percentage = male_percentage_num / total_percentage

    # L5
    total_turtles = total_males / male_percentage

    # FA
    answer = total_turtles
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Of the males with stripes, {baby_percentage_striped_males_num}% are babies because {total_percentage} - {adult_percentage_striped_males} = <<{total_percentage}-{adult_percentage_striped_males}={baby_percentage_striped_males_num}>>{baby_percentage_striped_males_num}

There are {total_striped_males} males with stripes because {num_baby_striped_males} / {baby_percentage_striped_males} = <<{num_baby_striped_males}/{baby_percentage_striped_males}={total_striped_males}>>{total_striped_males}
Males make up {male_percentage_num}% of the pond's total, because {total_percentage} - {female_percentage} = <<{total_percentage}-{female_percentage}={male_percentage_num}>>{male_percentage_num}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Of the males with stripes, 40% are babies because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are 10 males with stripes because 4 / 0.4 = <<4/0.4=10>>10
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Males make up 40% of the pond's total, because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'num_baby_striped_males' (value: 4) was used instead of 'male_percentage' (value: 0.4).
